comments:
Steps to Reproduce:
1.import two logs
2.create an AC correlation, say, a PMI correlation (it works fine for time 
correlation)
3.right click the correlation and select Properties
4.remove a log and click finish
5.NPE is thrown

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-08-11 16:52:42.067

TPTP correlation works fine because time correlation is using old interface to create correlation.
Since TPTP provided new interface to create correlation, AC is using that and using new interface editing existing correlation throws above exceptions.
If TPTP use new interface for its Time correlation, above exception can be reproduce.
Re-assigned to Alex as per his request.
